description.raw:
Addresses Issue #143.
(Merged pull request #370).

See documentation on [RoadMap](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/Roadmap).

Needs testing.

To test:
~~~
mkdir catkin_ws
mkdir catkin_ws/src
cd catkin_ws/src
hg clone #!/osrf/osrf-common -r catkin
hg clone #!/osrf/sandia-hand -r catkin
hg clone #!/osrf/drcsim -r catkin
git clone -b groovy-devel https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs.git
~~~

For example, `ls catkin_ws/src` should show 4 repositories:
~~~
osrf-common
sandia-hand
drcsim
gazebo_ros_pkgs
~~~

To build:
Assuming all system and ROS dependencies have been installed:
~~~
cd catkin_ws
source /opt/ros/groovy/setup.bash
catkin_make install
~~~
should do the job.  To run something, try:
~~~
cd catkin_ws/install
source setup.sh
source share/drcsim/setup.sh
roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas_sandia_hands.launch
~~~


John
